characters.name: Arthur Morgan
characters.phrase: You know, all that ever mattered to me was loyalty. It was all I knew. It was all I ever believed in...

characters.name: Dutch van der Linde
characters.phrase: We can't always fight nature, John. We can't fight change, we can't fight gravity, we can't fight nothin'. My whole life, all I ever did was fight...

characters.name: Hosea Matthews
characters.phrase: I wish I had acquired wisdom at less of a price.

characters.name: John Marston
characters.phrase: People don't forget. Nothing gets forgiven.

characters.name: Abigail Roberts
characters.phrase: John... I love you. Don't you forget that... not ever now.

characters.name: Jack Marston
characters.phrase: I guess there's only room for one hero in this family.

characters.name: Micah Bell
characters.phrase: I believe there's winners and losers... and nothing else besides.

characters.name: Charles Smith
characters.phrase: The amount of hell we've raised, we're owed some back.
